meta.title: Lionel Rowe · Full-Stack Web Developer · Portfolio and CV
meta.description: Full-stack web developer specializing in React JS, Ruby on Rails, and software localization. Previously: tech writer and translator for web apps from Alibaba Cloud, Huawei, and others. I like to build stuff that helps people be awesome at what they do.

gestuno.name: Gestuno
gestuno.shortDesc: Remote on-demand platform for deaf customers to engage interpreters
gestuno.fullDesc:
Sign-language interpreters spend 1/3 of their time traveling, which drives up the cost and wait times for vital interpreting services. Gestuno provides a convenient, affordable, on-demand solution for deaf customers to engage the interpreters they need.

Users select from available interpreters based on languages, qualifications, and other criteria to get the services they need, anytime, anywhere. Interpreting is provided over a live video connection and charged by the minute, eliminating overheads.

symbolika.name: Symbolika
symbolika.shortDesc: Search for and insert special characters from within your browser
symbolika.fullDesc:
A chrome extension allowing users to search for and insert over 28,000 unicode characters and emoji. Works with messaging apps, search engines, and more.

Design goals focused on initial load time and search speed, with a shared worker serving data from the front end.

b64.name: b64
b64.fullDesc:
JavaScript’s native implementation of Base64 encoding and decoding fails for characters outside the Latin 1 range. This experimental project allows for Base64 encoding of arbitrary Unicode strings, using the popular UTF-8 encoding.

The web front-end is an experiment in progressive enhancement, providing a modern web-app experience for most users, while still allowing full functionality via the back end even if JavaScript is disabled.

mixalot.name: Mix-a-Lot
mixalot.fullDesc: A full-stack rails app with a database of cocktail recipes. Users can search for a cocktail or get a random recommendation. User-generated content is also enabled, allowing users to upload their favorite cocktail recipes, ingredients, and images.

gol.name: Game of Life
gol.shortDesc: Implementation of John Conway’s famous cellular automaton
gol.fullDesc: A performant, browser-based implementation of Conway’s Game of Life. This implementation includes a parser for RLE files, allowing players to upload and run their favorite patterns. Players can also draw patterns on the canvas using the mouse.

secretGardens.name: Secret Gardens
secretGardens.shortDesc: Matching greenery-starved city dwellers with their ideal garden for hire
secretGardens.fullDesc: A full-stack React/Rails application matching greenery-starved city dwellers with their ideal garden for hire. Hosts can post their properties, and prospective customers can browse from among the available gardens.
